spec_data.Name: qt-recordmydesktop
spec_data.Description:
Graphical KDE frontend for the recordmydesktop desktop session recorder.

recordMyDesktop is a desktop session recorder for linux that attempts to be
easy to use, yet also effective at it's primary task.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 06:56:00 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: KDE Desktop session recorder with audio and video
